channel.title: FLF - Let's Talk Eschatology
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Nathanael Wright: Just How Bad Was It For Canadian Churches? [Let's Talk Eschatology]
item.description: Pastor Nathanael Wright, head of the Ezra Institute Canada, talks with Josh Howard about a host of topics, including the lockdown of Canadian churches, the Young, Restless and Reformed Movement, Joel Webbon's Christendom Conference, optimistic eschatology and more...
item.author: Dr Josh Howard
item.itunes:author: Dr Josh Howard
item.itunes:summary: Nathanael Wright: Just How Bad Was It For Canadian Churches? Law, Gospel and Optimistic Eschatology

item.title: EP6 Ben Merkle: Are Christian Universities and Seminaries Dead? How Can We Prepare Our Children? [Let's Talk Eschatology]
item.description: In this final bonus episode of Building Christian Communities, we look specifically at education. Dr Ben Merkle and Pastor Jacob Tanner discuss a range of topics pertaining to christian education, King Alfred, Postmillennialism and more...
item.author: Dr Josh Howard
item.itunes:author: Dr Josh Howard
item.itunes:summary: Christian Education and Building Christian Communities
